member.name: T:EyewearStore_SWP391.Controllers.FramesController
member.summary: API Controller for managing frame products

member.name: M:EyewearStore_SWP391.Controllers.FramesController.#ctor(EyewearStore_SWP391.Services.IFrameService)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the FramesController

member.name: M:EyewearStore_SWP391.Controllers.FramesController.CreateFrame(EyewearStore_SWP391.DTOs.Frame.CreateFrameDto)
member.summary: Creates a new frame product
member.response: Returns the newly created frame
If the frame data is invalid
If there was an internal server error

member.name: M:EyewearStore_SWP391.Controllers.FramesController.GetAllFrames(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Nullable{System.Decimal},System.Nullable{System.Decimal},System.Nullable{System.Boolean},System.String,System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets all frames with optional filtering, searching, sorting, and pagination
member.param: Search term for name, description, frame type, or material
Sort field (price, name, frameType, frameMaterial, createdAt)
member.response: Returns the list of frames
If there was an internal server error

member.name: M:EyewearStore_SWP391.Controllers.FramesController.GetFrameById(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a single frame by ID (ProductId)
member.response: Returns the frame
If the frame is not found
If there was an internal server error

member.name: M:EyewearStore_SWP391.Controllers.FramesController.UpdateFrame(System.Int32,EyewearStore_SWP391.DTOs.Frame.UpdateFrameDto)
member.summary: Updates an existing frame product
member.response: Returns the updated frame
If the frame data is invalid
If the frame is not found
If there was an internal server error

member.name: M:EyewearStore_SWP391.Controllers.FramesController.DeleteFrame(System.Int32)
member.summary: Soft deletes a frame by setting IsActive to false
member.response: The frame was successfully soft deleted
If the frame is not found
If there was an internal server error
member.remarks: Soft delete is implemented by setting IsActive to false. The product will no longer appear in active product listings.

member.name: T:EyewearStore_SWP391.Controllers.ImagesController
member.summary: API Controller for managing product images

member.summary: Uploads an image file and creates a ProductImage record
member.param: The product ID to associate with the image
Whether this is the primary image for the product
member.returns: The created image record with URL

member.summary: Gets images for a specific product

member.name: M:EyewearStore_SWP391.Controllers.ImagesController.GetImageById(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets an image by ID

member.name: M:EyewearStore_SWP391.Controllers.ImagesController.SetImageAsPrimary(System.Int32)
member.summary: Sets an image as the primary image for its product

member.name: M:EyewearStore_SWP391.Controllers.ImagesController.DeleteImage(System.Int32)
member.summary: Deletes an image (soft delete by setting IsActive to false)
